casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Clifford C. ABSHIRE, III
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-0983 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 21, 2018

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court of appeal before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing *904that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
